text.div:
SDOHCC Temporary Codes

The SDOHCC-Temporary-Codes code system is a local code system defined within the context of the SDOH-CC IG.

Copyright Statement: (c) 2020 HL7.org

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/sdoh-cc/CodeSystem/sdohcc-temporary-codes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
sdohcc-sctt-21000243108 Mild food insecurity (finding)TBD: Gravity Content Team
sdohcc-sctt-31000243105 Moderate food insecurity (finding)TBD: Gravity Content Team
sdohcc-sctt-41000243104 Severe food insecurity (finding)TBD: Gravity Content Team
sdohcc-sctt-111000243109 Assistance with application for Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (procedure)TBD: Gravity Content Team
sdohcc-sctt-101000243107 Evaluation of eligibility for Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (procedure)TBD: Gravity Content Team
sdohcc-sctt-91000243106 Food security (finding)TBD: Gravity Content Team
sdohcc-hl7t-screening_task-request screening task requestIndicates a message that is a screening task request as defined by the Gravity SDOH-CC IG
sdohcc-hl7t-screening-response screening responseIndicates a message that is a screening response as defined by the Gravity SDOH-CC IG
sdohcc-hl7t-screening-response-taskStatusUpdate screening task response TaskStatusUpdateIndicates a message that is response providing a TaskStatusUpdate as defined by the Gravity SDOH-CC IG

name: SDOHCC_Temporary_Codes
title: SDOHCC Temporary Codes
description: The SDOHCC-Temporary-Codes code system is a local code system defined within the context of the SDOH-CC IG.
purpose: The purpose of this code system is to enable temporary codes to be assigned to concepts that are needed to document SDOH-related data elements defined by the Gravity Project community and concepts that are needed to facilitate the use of FHIR to exchange data as required in the use cases covered by this IG.  After the IG has been sufficiently tested through HL7 Connectathons and the coded concepts have been confirmed as fit for the intended purpose, and consensus on the use of the codes has been confirmed through the HL7 Ballot process, the temporary codes will be replaced with coded concepts established within nationally recognized, open code systems.  The replacement of temporary codes with permanent codes is intended to happen prior to the IG being published by HL7.

concept.display: Assistance with application for Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (procedure)
Evaluation of eligibility for Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (procedure)

concept.definition: Indicates a message that is a screening task request as defined by the Gravity SDOH-CC IG
Indicates a message that is a screening response as defined by the Gravity SDOH-CC IG
Indicates a message that is response providing a TaskStatusUpdate as defined by the Gravity SDOH-CC IG
